main.intro: Hello, you've reached Blazed Labs, if you know you party's extension, you may dial it now, or stay on the line to be connected to an operator.

main.sales: Press 1 to reach the sales department.

main.support: Press 2 to reach the support help desk.

main.publishing: Press 3 to reach the publishing division of Blazed Labs.
Press 4 to reach the Human Resources department.

main.other: For all other inquiries, please stay on the line.

sales.intro: If you are a returning customer, and you have an existing ticket or order number, please input it now.

sales.sales_rep: Press 1 to speak with a sales representative to purchase products or services.

sales.billing: Press 2 to reach the billing department.

sales.marketing: Press 3 to speak with the marketing department.

sales.support: Press 4 to speak with the technical support department, for help with Blazed products and services.

sales.other: For all other sales inquiries, please stay on the line.

support.intro: If you have an existing ticket number, please input it now.

support.new_ticket: Press 1 to start a new ticket and get support.

support.report: Press 2 to report a bug or issue with our software.

support.urgent: Press 3 to speak with an engineer concerning an urgent issue.

support.other: For all other support inquiries, please use our online support form at blazedlabs.com/contact
